cookies.title: Cookie Policy
cookies.content:
At WebFine, we use cookies to provide you with the best experience on our website.

### What are Cookies?
Cookies are small text files saved to your computer or mobile device by the websites you visit.

### How Do We Use Cookies?
- **Essential Cookies:** Necessary for basic functions of our site.
- **Analytical Cookies:** Help us understand how you use our site.
- **Functional Cookies:** Allow us to remember your preferences.

### How Can You Control Cookies?
You can block or delete cookies from your browser settings.

kvkk.title: GDPR / KVKK
kvkk.content:
Protecting your personal data is a priority for WebFine.

### Data Controller
In accordance with legal regulations on personal data protection, your personal data may be processed by WebFine as the data controller.

### Purposes of Data Processing
- Providing and improving our services.
- Carrying out communication activities.
- Fulfilling legal obligations.

### Your Rights
You have the right to access, correct, and delete your data in accordance with relevant data protection laws.

privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.content:
Your privacy is important to us.

### Information We Collect
When you visit our site, fill out a contact form, or use our services, some personal information may be collected.

### Information Security
We use the latest security technologies to protect your data against unauthorized access.

### Third Parties
Your personal data is not shared with third parties except for legal obligations.
